Parameter.Title: Energy detection mode configuration.
Parameter.Description: Sets the reports for solar power. 0 - Report Wattage and the absolute KWH value. (default) (Homeseer) 1 - Report positive/negative Wattage and the algebraic sum KWH value. 2 - Report positive/negative Wattage and the positive KWH value (consuming electricity). 3 - Report positive/negative Wattage and the negative KWH value (generating electricity).

Parameter.Title: Enable/Disable the function of parameter 4 and 11.
Parameter.Description: When to report switch status changes to controller and associated devices. 0 - Disable the function of parameter 4 and 11. (Homeseer) 1 - Enable the function of parameter 4 and 11. (default)

Parameter.Title: Induce a automatic report of whole HEM.
Parameter.Description: The threshold can be set from 0 to 32767 watt. Values: 0 to 32767.

Parameter.Title: Induce a automatic report of Channel 1.
Parameter.Description: The threshold can be set from 0 to 32767 watt. Values: 0 to 32767.

Parameter.Title: Induce a automatic report of Channel 2.
Parameter.Description: The threshold can be set from 0 to 32767 watt. Values: 0 to 32767.

Parameter.Title: Induce a automatic report of whole HEM.
Parameter.Description: The threshold can be set from 0 to 100 percent. Values: 0 to 100.

Parameter.Title: Induce a automatic report of Channel 1.
Parameter.Description: The threshold can be set from 0 to 100 percent. Values: 0 to 100.

Parameter.Title: Induce a automatic report of Channel 2.
Parameter.Description: The threshold can be set from 0 to 100 percent. Values: 0 to 100.

Parameter.Title: Enable /disable CRC-16 Encapsulation.
Parameter.Description: 0 - Disable CRC-16 Encapsulation. (default) 1 - Enable CRC-16 Encapsulation. (Homeseer)

Parameter.Title: To set which report need to be sent.
Parameter.Description: 1 - Report Accumulated kWh of whole HEM. 2 - Report Instantaneous Watts of whole HEM. (default) 4 - Report Instantaneous Voltage of whole HEM. 8 - Report Instantaneous Current (Amperes) of whole HEM. 256 - Report Instantaneous Watts of Channel 1. 768 - Report Instantaneous Watts of Channel 2. 2048 - Report Accumulated kWh of Channel 1. 4096 - Report Accumulated kWh of Channel 2. 65536 - Report Instantaneous Voltage of Channel 1. 196608 - Report Instantaneous Voltage of Channel 2. 524288 - Report Instantaneous Current (Amperes) of Channel 1. 1048576 - Report Instantaneous Current (Amperes) of Channel 2. 1776384 - Report all reports on Channel 1 + 2 (Homeseer)

Parameter.Title: To set which report need to be sent.
Parameter.Description: 1 - Report Accumulated kWh of whole HEM. (default) 2 - Report Instantaneous Watts of whole HEM. 4 - Report Instantaneous Voltage of whole HEM. 8 - Report Instantaneous Current (Amperes) of whole HEM. 256 - Report Instantaneous Watts of Channel 1. 768 - Report Instantaneous Watts of Channel 2. 2048 - Report Accumulated kWh of Channel 1. 4096 - Report Accumulated kWh of Channel 2. 65536 - Report Instantaneous Voltage of Channel 1. 196608 - Report Instantaneous Voltage of Channel 2. 524288 - Report Instantaneous Current (Amperes) of Channel 1. 1048576 - Report Instantaneous Current (Amperes) of Channel 2. 1776384 - Report all reports on Channel 1 and 2 (Homeseer)

Parameter.Title: To set which report need to be sent.
Parameter.Description: 1 - Report Accumulated kWh of whole HEM. (default) 2 - Report Instantaneous Watts of whole HEM. 4 - Report Instantaneous Voltage of whole HEM. 8 - Report Instantaneous Current (Amperes) of whole HEM. 256 - Report Instantaneous Watts of Channel 1. 768 - Report Instantaneous Watts of Channel 2. 2048 - Report Accumulated kWh of Channel 1. 4096 - Report Accumulated kWh of Channel 2. 65536 - Report Instantaneous Voltage of Channel 1. 196608 - Report Instantaneous Voltage of Channel 2. 524288 - Report Instantaneous Current (Amperes) of Channel 1. 1048576 - Report Instantaneous Current (Amperes) of Channel 2. 1776384 - Report all reports on Channel 1 and 2 (Homeseer)

Parameter.Title: Set the interval time of sending report.
Set the interval time of sending report.
Set the interval time of sending report.
